title: Wsd restaurant logo advice please
content: this logo is for a primarily dutch cuisine restaurant. any advice that could be supplied would be greatly appreciated. cheers. ![oranje restaurant logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023070523im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/36125.jpg)
author: karl

comments.content:
dutch - interesting choice for ORANJE then.   
   
it might be fun to fill the space in J with your orange dots instead - just to unify things.

Props for drawing your own letters!   
   
I can see that you are trying to relate the a and e. Typically this is done by giving them (optically) the same amount of counter. In other words, consider making the the bowl of your a very small (like the eye on the e), or the eye of the e very large like the bowl on the a. I'd actually meet somewhere in the middle.   
   
Try bar & restaurant in caps. Maybe even extended caps for a little contrast.   
   
Randy
